Text:
Avoid this unless you can take the overly loud Japanese announcer that out talks the announcers.

I want a GOOD (720p?) release with the original announcers.  Anyone out there able to help?  I know it was a slaughter but I try and keep all the Bama games throughout the year.

Thanks!
I also want a 720p release of this game.. Along with the goddamn ESPN "Showdown Saturday clouds" picture that he took out of every game he uploaded.
